courses.foundation_programming.title: Foundation Programming
courses.foundation_programming.desc: This course is considered the first step towards programming, providing a strong foundation for future developers.
courses.dotnet_bootcamp.title: .NET Bootcamp
courses.dotnet_bootcamp.desc: .NET framework is used in many areas of programming, such as mobile, web, and desktop applications. An intensive bootcamp for deep immersion.
courses.dotnet_backend.title: .NET Backend
courses.dotnet_backend.desc: This course is suitable for those who have basic knowledge in programming and wish to specialize in backend development.
courses.ai_bootcamp.title: AI Bootcamp

courses.flutter_mobile.title: Flutter Cross-platform (Flutter Mobile)
courses.flutter_mobile.desc: Flutter is an SDK developed by Google that can create programs for both iOS and Android from a single codebase.
courses.python_beginner_kids.title: Python Beginner (Kids)
courses.python_beginner_kids.desc: The Python Beginner course is the first step towards programming, designed specifically for children to make learning fun.
courses.arduino_robotics_kids.title: Arduino & Robotics (Kids)
courses.arduino_robotics_kids.desc: The Robotics module is mainly for school-age children interested in electronics, programming, and building their own robots.
courses.scratch_kids.title: Scratch (Kids)
courses.scratch_kids.desc: Our course is designed for school-age children who want to take their first steps in programming in an easy and playful way.

foundation_programming.title: Foundation (Programming)
foundation_programming.desc: Our Foundation course is designed for those taking their first steps into the world of programming.
foundation_programming.full_description: This course is the ideal starting point for anyone dreaming of becoming a programmer but unsure where to begin. We cover the fundamentals of programming logic, algorithms, and data structures using simple and clear examples. You will learn to write clean and efficient code, which will lay a strong foundation for further study of any programming language. Upon completion of the course, you will be ready for more advanced topics such as web development or data analysis.

dotnet_bootcamp.title: .NET Bootcamp
dotnet_bootcamp.desc: An intensive .NET bootcamp that will prepare you for a career as a developer.
dotnet_bootcamp.full_description: An intensive .NET bootcamp that will prepare you for a career as a developer. A deep dive into C#, ASP.NET Core, and databases. The course includes practical projects, teamwork, and interview preparation. You will learn to create full-fledged web applications, work with frameworks and design patterns, and deploy applications to the cloud. Ideally suited for those who want to quickly master a sought-after profession.

dotnet_backend.title: .NET Backend
dotnet_backend.desc: Build powerful and scalable server applications using .NET.
dotnet_backend.full_description: Build powerful and scalable server applications using .NET. The course covers API development, microservices, working with databases (SQL, NoSQL), and cloud technologies (Azure/AWS). You will learn how to build fault-tolerant systems, ensure data security, and optimize performance. This course is essential for backend developers looking to deepen their knowledge in the Microsoft ecosystem.

ai_bootcamp.title: AI Bootcamp
ai_bootcamp.desc: Dive into the world of artificial intelligence and machine learning.
ai_bootcamp.full_description: Dive into the world of artificial intelligence and machine learning. A practical course on building and deploying AI models. You will learn the basics of Python for data analysis, machine learning algorithms (classification, regression, clustering), as well as an introduction to neural networks. The course focuses on the practical application of acquired knowledge to solve real-world problems.

flutter_mobile.title: Flutter (Mobile Development)
flutter_mobile.desc: Learn to create beautiful and performant mobile applications for iOS and Android using Flutter.
flutter_mobile.full_description: Learn to create beautiful and performant mobile applications for iOS and Android using Google's Flutter framework. The course covers the basics of the Dart language, Flutter widgets, state management, working with APIs, and publishing applications. You will create several fully functional applications that will run on both platforms with a single codebase.

python_beginner_kids.title: Python for Kids (Beginner)
python_beginner_kids.desc: A fun and interactive course on the basics of Python programming, specially designed for children.
python_beginner_kids.full_description: A fun and interactive course on the basics of Python programming, specially designed for children. Develop logic and creativity through solving puzzles, creating simple games, and animations. Children will learn basic coding concepts in a playful way, which stimulates their interest in IT and develops critical thinking skills.

arduino_robotics_kids.title: Arduino and Robotics (Kids)
arduino_robotics_kids.desc: An introduction to the world of electronics and robotics using the Arduino platform.
arduino_robotics_kids.full_description: An introduction to the world of electronics and robotics using the Arduino platform. Children will learn to assemble and program simple robots, control sensors, and actuators. The course develops engineering thinking, problem-solving skills, and fine motor skills, as well as introducing the basics of physics and electronics.

scratch_kids_original.title: Scratch (Kids - Original)
scratch_kids_original.desc: Visual programming for the youngest, developing logical thinking.
scratch_kids_original.full_description: Visual programming for the youngest, developing logical thinking through creating games and animations in the Scratch environment. Children master the basics of algorithms, loops, conditions, and variables without having to write code, simply by dragging and dropping blocks. This is an excellent start for developing creativity and analytical abilities.

scratch_kids.title: Scratch (Kids)
scratch_kids.desc: Our course is designed for schoolchildren who want to take their first steps in programming using Scratch.
scratch_kids.full_description: Our course is designed for schoolchildren who want to take their first steps in programming using the visual language Scratch. They will learn to create their own interactive stories, games, and animations, developing logical thinking and creative abilities. The course takes place in a playful way, which makes learning engaging and accessible for young programmers.

react_native_mobile.title: React Native (Mobile Development)
react_native_mobile.desc: Learn React Native to build cross-platform mobile applications.
react_native_mobile.full_description: Learn React Native to build cross-platform mobile applications. Build real-world apps that run on both iOS and Android with a single codebase. The course covers the basics of React, Redux, navigation, working with local storage, and APIs. You'll master all the tools needed to create modern mobile applications.

ios_mobile_swift.title: iOS Mobile (Swift)
ios_mobile_swift.desc: Create native applications for iPhone and iPad using Swift.
ios_mobile_swift.full_description: Create native applications for iPhone and iPad using Swift, Apple's powerful and intuitive programming language. The course delves into the basics of Swift, UIKit/SwiftUI, application lifecycle, data handling, and device hardware interaction. You will develop several full-fledged iOS applications ready for publication on the App Store.

python_backend.title: Python Backend
python_backend.desc: Our Python Backend course is an excellent choice for those who want to master backend web application development.
python_backend.full_description: Our Python Backend course is an excellent choice for those who want to master backend web application development using Python, Django, and Flask. You will learn RESTful APIs, databases (PostgreSQL), authentication, authorization, and application deployment. The course includes many practical assignments and real-world projects that will help you become a qualified backend developer.

phonics_level1.title: Phonics Level 1
phonics_level1.desc: Phonics Level 1 is an introductory course designed for children to lay a strong foundation in reading and pronouncing English words.
phonics_level1.full_description: Phonics Level 1 is an introductory course designed specifically for preschool and early elementary children to lay a strong foundation in reading and pronouncing English words. We use interactive games, songs, and engaging activities to make the learning process fun and effective. Children will learn to recognize basic English sounds, match them with letters, and read simple words, which is a crucial step towards fluent reading.

phonics_level2.title: Phonics Level 2
phonics_level2.desc: Phonics Level 2 continues to build upon the skills learned in Phonics Level 1.
phonics_level2.full_description: Phonics Level 2 continues to build upon the skills learned in Phonics Level 1, deepening understanding of sounds and letter combinations. At this stage, children learn to read more complex words and master digraphs and diphthongs. The course includes more group games and exercises on reading short sentences, which helps build confidence in their reading skills.

phonics_level3.title: Phonics Level 3
phonics_level3.desc: Phonics Level 3 deepens students' knowledge of phonics.
phonics_level3.full_description: Phonics Level 3 deepens students' knowledge of phonics and helps them tackle more complex reading and pronunciation rules. This course covers long vowels, syllable division rules, and reading multi-syllabic words. Students begin reading short stories and poems, which improves their comprehension and reading fluency.

phonics_level4.title: Phonics Level 4
phonics_level4.desc: Phonics Level 4 is the final stage in the Phonics program.
phonics_level4.full_description: Phonics Level 4 is the final stage in the Phonics program, solidifying all acquired knowledge and skills for fluent reading. Children learn exceptions to rules, master reading complex texts, and work on intonation. The course aims to develop independent reading and prepare for more complex educational materials in the future.

coursesPage.title: Our Courses
coursesPage.subtitle: Discover a wide range of courses designed for all ages and skill levels. Start your journey in IT today!

cta.title: Start Your Journey Today!
cta.description: Join Ilm Hub Learning Center and take the first step towards a brighter future with our innovative courses and expert guidance.

aboutHero.title: Start your journey with

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to common questions about our courses and Ilmhub

courses_offered.a: Ilmhub offers a wide range of courses including programming, languages, mathematics, physics, design, and more.

how_to_enroll.q: How can I enroll in a course at Ilmhub?
how_to_enroll.a: You can enroll online through our website by selecting a course and completing the registration form.

course_duration.q: What is the duration of each course?
course_duration.a: Courses typically range from 1 to 6 months depending on the subject and level.

requirements.q: Are there any prerequisites for joining Ilmhub courses?
requirements.a: Most courses require only basic knowledge and interest in the topic. Full details are available in course descriptions.

certificates.q: Do you offer certificates after completing the courses?
certificates.a: Yes, all students receive official certificates upon completion of Ilmhub courses.

footer.missionStatement: Ilm Hub is an innovative educational platform designed to make learning accessible and engaging for everyone.
footer.newsletterDesc: Get the latest news, updates, and exclusive offers delivered directly to your inbox.
footer.newsletterDisclaimer: We'll never share your data with anyone else.
